metadata.title: CVE-2020-13230 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Cacti before 1.2.11, disabling a user account does not immediately invalidate any permissions granted to that account (e.g., permission to view logs).

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
